basalt_door_1@cottage.desc[1]: A large basalt door bars any southern progression.
basalt_door_1@cottage.name: basalt_door_1
basalt_door_1@cottage.examine: It's extremely heavy, and will probably require assistance to open.
basalt_door_1@cottage.desc[0]: A large basalt door opens south into an entryway.

skiff@cottage.name: skiff
skiff@cottage.desc[0]: A small battered skiff lies here.

runes_1@cottage.name: runes_1
runes_1@cottage.examine:
"You see me now a veteran,
	       of a thousand giantish wars.
	  I've been living on the edge too long,
	      where the winds of limbo roar.
	     And, I'm young enough to look at,
		  and far too old to see,
	    all the scars are on the inside...
			 KEEP OUT!"

memoirs_tome@cottage.desc[1]: There is a huge tome of memoirs on the desk.
memoirs_tome@cottage.name: memoirs_tome
memoirs_tome@cottage.examine: These memoirs are scrawled out in the giantish script and are unreadable.
memoirs_tome@cottage.desc[0]: A giant tome of memoirs has been placed here.

gate_door@cottage.desc[1]: The gate to the fence is closed.
gate_door@cottage.name: gate_door
gate_door@cottage.desc[0]: An open fence gate offers passage north.

knife_cleaver@cottage.name: knife_cleaver
knife_cleaver@cottage.examine: Nothing like having a good weapon, eh?
knife_cleaver@cottage.desc[0]: A heavy duty meat cleaver is sitting on the counter.

scarab@cottage.desc[1]: A beautiful scarab lies in the sarcophagus.
scarab@cottage.name: scarab
scarab@cottage.examine: This emerald treasure has the form of a desert insect.
scarab@cottage.desc[0]: A beautiful scarab has been placed here.

door_wheel@cottage.name: door_wheel
door_wheel@cottage.examine:
The spoked wheel is old and rusted; above it are printed the words
	'Emergency Gate Control'
door_wheel@cottage.desc[0]: With a lot of effort, the gate has been opened, draining the resevoir.

crowbar@cottage.desc[1]: A heavy crowbar lies here bracing the kitchen door.
crowbar@cottage.name: crowbar
crowbar@cottage.examine: You could probably do some good damage with it!
crowbar@cottage.desc[0]: A very heavy steel crowbar is here.

gilded_cowl@cottage.desc[1]: A gilded cowl becons you to wear it.
gilded_cowl@cottage.name: gilded_cowl
gilded_cowl@cottage.desc[0]: A gilded cowl has been carelessly discarded here.

sphere@cottage.desc[1]: A small golden sphere winks up at you.
sphere@cottage.name: sphere
sphere@cottage.examine: This golden sphere emits a bright light.
sphere@cottage.desc[0]: A small golden sphere shimmers off to one side.

angelfood_cake@cottage.name: angelfood_cake
angelfood_cake@cottage.examine: It is an angelfood cake of course!

sarcophagus@cottage.name: sarcophagus
sarcophagus@cottage.examine:
You are strnangely drawn to this ancient coffin, but despite your
curiosity, the fear of some unknown curse lingers in the back of your mind.

door@cottage.name: door
door@cottage.desc[0]: An open door provides passage west into a kitchen.

flail@cottage.desc[1]: A gorgeous flail rests in the corner of the sarcophagus.
flail@cottage.name: flail
flail@cottage.desc[0]: The Flail of Isis lies here.

runes@cottage.name: runes
runes@cottage.examine: Caution: Something ancient and very powerful is here.

basalt_door@cottage.name: basalt_door
basalt_door@cottage.examine: It's extremely heavy, and will probably require assistance to open.

cottage19@cottage.title: Still Water
cottage19@cottage.description:
You're knee-deep in the still waters of the underground resevoir.
These waters extend west around a bend lying to the south.

cottage18@cottage.title: Shoreline
cottage18@cottage.description:
The damp passage ends here, leading down into an underground resevoir.
The sound of running water echoes out of the darkness.  The large shape
of a forgotten dam looms out of the darkness to the south.

cottage7@cottage.title: Driveway
cottage7@cottage.description:
You are currently standing on a short, cobblestone driveway.  A short path
connects it with the porch to the west.  In front of you stands a large
barn door.

cottage12@cottage.title: Narrow Ledge
cottage12@cottage.description:
You stand upon a narrow ledge running north and south along the cliff
face.  the outlines of a natural, stone bridge spanning the chasm are
clearly visible to the south.

cottage11@cottage.title: Cliff Face
cottage11@cottage.description:
Standing on a ledge running north and south a few feet below the
top of a cliff, you stare down into the swirling mists below.  You may,
if careful, be able to scramble up to the valley above.  The outlines of
a bridge spanning the chasm are barely visible to the south.

cottage9@cottage.title: Cliff Turn
cottage9@cottage.description:
You stand on a narrow ledge, your back to the cliff face.  Above
you can see the top of the cliff, but there is no way to climb up.  Silver
mists obsucre the bottom of the chasm far below.  It is here that the wide
ledge to the south meets up with a very narrow ledge to the east.

cottage22@cottage.title: Resevoir Bottom
cottage22@cottage.description:
As you stand on the muddy bottom of the resevoir you are able to
see where an underground stream fed the resevoir from the west.  Picking
your way eastward across a large jumble of stones you could probably
make your way out of this muddy area, or you could return to the heights
of the dam by ascending the narrow stair.
There are some ancient runes here that catch your eye.

cottage20@cottage.title: Still Water
cottage20@cottage.description:
You're waist-deep in the dark still waters of an underground resevoir.
The artificial lake extends to the north, around a bend lying to the east.
You can also climb up to the top of the dam, but climbin back down looks
almost impossible.

cottage10@cottage.title: Collapsing Ledge
cottage10@cottage.description:
The ledge narrows here to an untraversable width.  As you attempt to
turn and make your way back up to the west, the ledge collapses.  You are
wondering how deep the chasm truly is when the sudden stop enlightens you.

cottage21@cottage.title: Top of Dam
cottage21@cottage.description:
Standing atop the underground dam you can peer over the rusted
guardrail to the south, but the dam's bottom is hidden in blackness.
The resevoir lies to the north; from here you can see a narrow staircase
down, which continues below the waterline.  A large rusted release
wheel protrudes from a mass of pipes nearby.

cottage2@cottage.title: Peaceful Valley
cottage2@cottage.description:
You have entered a small valley snuggled amidst the towering peaks.  It
is so peaceful you can not help but smile just from being here.  Animals of all
kinds play about you, some even cautiously approach, their eyes aglow with
curiosity.
   To the north stands a cozy cottage surrounded by a white picket fence, and
adorned with several neatly trimmed hedges.  The main branch of the valley lies
to the south, and you may be able to slide down into a ledge to the east.

cottage15@cottage.title: Huge Entryway
cottage15@cottage.description:
Sad breezes sigh forlornly through the fallen rocks which lie strewn
about.  In front of you to the north, stands an immense basalt door, its
black surface glimmering in the ambient light.  Above the door are
written another set of weatherbeaten runes.

cottage14@cottage.title: Natural Bridge

cottage24@cottage.title: Tomb of Ramses IV
cottage24@cottage.description:
Rising all about you, you see jeweled panel and statues adorned
with heiroglyphics and carvings of all kinds.  Dominating this room
however, is the immense sarcophagus of The Pharoh Ramses IV.  It
emanates tendrils of magical energy which seem to reach into your soul
intently searching for you know not what.  After a moment you realize that
this room is incredibly dry, especially in comparison to the one that
you just left.

cottage4@cottage.title: Living Room
cottage4@cottage.description:
You have entered the living room of the quaint cottage, the housewife
is here busily sweeping.  A family sized crystal ball sits here opposite
a comfy, blue sofa with enormous cushions.  The smell of baking wafts from
a tiny kitchen to the east, and you may also return south to the porch.

cottage8@cottage.title: Inside the Barn
cottage8@cottage.description:
This is a clean, well kept barn.  A large, cherry-red, horse-buggy
sits here; it seems to be leering at you.  On its plate you can
make out a set of runes spelling "Christine".  There are a few dozen
different tools hanging here, but their purposes are beyond your
experience.

cottage17@cottage.title: Damp Passage
cottage17@cottage.description:
The first thing that you notice upon entering this room is the heavy
layer of condensation which has collected on the walls.  The passage slopes
steeply downward to the south, but you can not see what lies that way, for it
is too dark.  A rectangle of light pours in from the western passage.

cottage1@cottage.title: Serene Valley
cottage1@cottage.description:
This valley, nestled amidst the surrounding peaks, is a place of serene
tranquility.  Long swaths of green mountain grass beckon you to kick off
your boots and frolic about.  A branch of the valley extends to the north, and
you can return to the more mountainous regions lying to the east.  Going west
will take you back to the crossroads.

cottage13@cottage.title: Bridge Landing
cottage13@cottage.description:
Before you a monstrous, natural bridge stretches across the chasm to
the east.  A pair of stalagmites stand like silent guardians forming
an entryway onto the bridge.

cottage3@cottage.title: Front Porch
cottage3@cottage.description:
You are standing on the front porch of the picturesque cottage.  The
woman of the house stands here obviously in a cleaning frenzy.  A narrow
flower-lined walk heads east to a short driveway, while a peaceful valley
becons southward.

cottage5@cottage.title: Petite Kitchen
cottage5@cottage.description:
You are surrounded by the smells of baking and the cheery warmth of a
small wood stove.  There has obviously been some cooking done here
recently.  You can hear the sounds of cleaning coming from the west and
a small door leads east.

cottage6@cottage.title: Front Walk
cottage6@cottage.description:
This narrow path runs from east to west connecting the front porch
with the driveway.  You treak carefully so as to avoid trampling the flowers.

cottage16@cottage.title: Giant's Chamber
cottage16@cottage.description:
Everything here seems to be expanded to a grand scale;  easily twice
as large as usual.  A huge stone table, covered by a plain, white cloth,
dominates the center of the room.  A large cot is set along the western
wall, and a simple, writing desk stands opposite it.

cottage23@cottage.title: Lost Cavern
cottage23@cottage.description:
Water runs in rivulets down the walls of this cave, feeding the
stream which meanders eastward toward the damn.  the western wall of
this forgotten cave has been cut smooth and adorned with magnificent
carvings.  In the midst of these carvings stands an ornately wrought
golden door, covered in runes.  You seem to feel strange emanations of
magic brush your consciousness from somewhere behind the golden portal.

cousin@cottage.name: cousin
cousin@cottage.description: Cousin Joe has a very shifty look in his eye as he listens to John.

vet@cottage.name: vet
vet@cottage.description: Vet, the veteran, is here mumbling 'Kill! Kill! Kill!'

kitty@cottage.name: kitty
kitty@cottage.description: Kitty da kitty-cat is amusing herself with a ball of yarn.

doggy@cottage.name: doggy
doggy@cottage.description: Doggy, the pet doberman wants to play with you.

prowler@cottage.name: prowler
prowler@cottage.description: Yikes!!!  A prowler is here trying to steal the buggy.

brother@cottage.name: brother
brother@cottage.description: Brother John is here with his cousin plotting to kill the dog.

father@cottage.name: father
father@cottage.description: Father is walking around looking for his newspaper and he's mad.

mother@cottage.name: mother
mother@cottage.description: Mother is preparing dinner and she doesn't look too happy about it.

sister@cottage.name: sister
sister@cottage.description: Sister Kate is sneaking pieces of cake as she eyes her mom's movements.

ramses@cottage.name: ramses
ramses@cottage.description: Ramses has been waiting a LONG time for you.
